content: --धरः, --धारः {1} ‘the thread-holder’, a stage-manager, the principal actor who arranges the cast of characters and instructs them, and takes a prominent part in the Prastāvanā or prelude; he is thus defined. --नाट्यस्य यदनुष्ठानं तत्सूत्रं स्यात्सबीजकम् . रंगदैवतपूजाकृत् सूत्रधार इति स्मृतः ... {2} a carpenter, an artisan. {3} the author of a set of aphorisms. {4} an epithet of Indra.
